oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Nashville man campaigning for Beverly Briley, ca. 1962
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Nashville man campaigning for Beverly Briley, circa 1962. Briley was elected as the first mayor of Metro in November 1962 and served in that capacity until 1975. b & w; 35 mm.
